name: linode
description: Deploys infrastructure on Linode (Akamai Cloud) with Linodes, Firewalls, and VLANs. Strong Kubernetes support with Cluster Autoscaler and Akamai edge network integration. Use when: setting up Linode/Akamai infrastructure, deploying Linodes, configuring firewalls, needing Kubernetes autoscaling, wanting Akamai CDN integration.
